updated_cases.title: Validate User justification with client based notification with HTTP2 enabled with block option
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate User justification with client based notification with HTTP2 enabled
updated_cases.custom_preconds: stack should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable HTTP2
create user alert policy for upload of google gmail app
select default/custom tempalte in policy
login to gmail app
perform upload activity
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1.User justification page should popup and file should get uploaded after clicking on proceed
2.Proper UJ events should be generated in Skope IT
3.Activity should be Upload
4.Justification reason and justification type should be seen in UJ event.
5.UJ Event should contain policyname and referer name.

updated_cases.title: Validate user justification with HTTP header profile with client based notification.
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate user justification with HTTP header profile
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Create http header profile response:content-length==min and max
Create a User justification profile and add both the http header profiles
Access http://172.16.178.108/altos_ctypes/ctype.x_compress
Policy and profiles created successfully
updated_cases.custom_expected: Make sure user justification policy is hit after http://172.16.178.108/altos_ctypes/ctype.x_compres is hit.

updated_cases.title: Validate default block notification with client based notification with IPS enabled for malware traffic with Upload activity
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate default block notification with client based notification with IPS enabled for malware traffic
updated_cases.custom_preconds: stack should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enable IPS. 
2. Use default template.
3. Change usernotification setting to use client.
4. Login to Box app.
5. Upload malware file.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Make sure IPS block template is displayed.
2. Uploading file is blocked.

updated_cases.title: Validate default block notification with client based notification with IPS enabled for malware traffic with Download activity.
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate default block notification with client based notification with IPS enabled for malware traffic
updated_cases.custom_preconds: stack should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enable IPS. 
2. Use default template.
3. Change usernotification setting to use client.
4. Login to Box app.
5. Download malware file.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Make sure IPS block template is displayed.
2. Downloading file is blocked.

updated_cases.title: Validate custom block notification with client based notification with IPS enabled for malware traffic with Upload activity
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate default block notification with client based notification with IPS enabled for malware traffic
updated_cases.custom_preconds: stack should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enable IPS. 
2. Use custom template having different variables like URL, category, etc.
3. Change usernotification setting to use client.
4. Login to Box app.
5. Upload malware file.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Make sure custom block template is displayed.
2. Uploading file is blocked.
